channel.title: Stem Cell Research
channel.description:
Discuss. I am doing a research paper and will have a 30 minute discussion at the end of my speech and want to hear your opinions.
I am pro stem cell research. With today's technology using embryonic stem cells are being used less and less and more induced pluripotent stem cells are being used as we discover new things about them which will hopefully in the future not require embryonic stem cells at all.
Please do a little research if you don't know much on the topic. Also, watch this video. http://stemcells.nih.gov/info/basics/pages/basics1.aspx
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=eXO_ApjKPaI[/youtube]

item.title: Stem Cell Research
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

Uncalled:

If you know even the basics of what stem cells are, then I don’t see why anyone would be against it.

completely agree, however you can’t please everybody and even though the embryos are only 4-5 days old, some will still cry it’s life

Read full topic

item.title: Stem Cell Research
item.dc:creator: @Muroth Muroth
item.description:
@Muroth wrote:

It seemed everybody in my class while discussing was also pro-stem cell research. Many thought it as interesting and wanted to learn more, some were dumb founded, and others, just had no clue what was going on.

Read full topic
